nodes.text: A stun cannon (or stun-cannon) was a weapon that fired stun blasts. A heavy stun cannon was mounted on the Corporate Sector Authority's Securitech Espo Walker 101.

In 5 ABY, Luke Skywalker brought a man-portable stun-cannon with him to the planet Arzid to deal with any arachnors they encountered, though it became separated from him when such an encounter occurred.
